A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Utter garbage filled with plot holes. The star fights were alright\, but again the logic and lore that were previously established in star wars has been broken. Princess Leia's new ability is also immersion breaking. They destroy the image of Luke Skywalker\, and the final Luke scene in the movie is anything but satisfying. Admiral Akbar also makes a similarly unsatisfying appearance. Rey is ridiculously overpowered with no sense of character progression. Also the politics of the movie turned me off. This does not love up to the expectations of a start wars movie in the slightest.
